column6: After last issue's shocking murder, there's evidence on the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier that will bring down the killer. So...The Hulk is going after it - and might bring down the Helicarrier instead!  The one person standing in the Hulk's path - Iron Man! Also, the return of the LAST person you ever expected to see! Game on!
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | colorist:Jason Keith | writer:Jeph Loeb | penciller (cover):Ed McGuinness | inker:Dexter Vines
